. You shouldn't install translation to bin directory!!
Instead, you may want to load translation file from different location on UNIX platforms. Change below line (in main.cpp)
ssqt5t.load("ssqt5_" + QLocale::system().name(), QCoreApplication::applicationDirPath());
to platform-sensible lines, maybe
```
ifdef Q_OS_WIN
ssqt5t.load("ssqt5_" + QLocale::system().name(), QCoreApplication::applicationDirPath());
else
ssqt5t.load("ssqt5_" + QLocale::system().name(), "/usr/share/shadowsocks-qt5");
endif
```
And the translation file should be installed to /usr/share/shadowsocks-qt5

wzhy90:
I have update all the translation's line number and clean the unused strings. You can update and release the translation file by using lupdate and lrelease very easily.
In this project, cd to root dir and using 
lupdate src/*.ui -ts src/i18n/ssqt5_zh_CN.ts
when you complete the translation, use
lrelease src/i18n/ssqt5_zh_CN.ts
to generate the .pm file.
Also you can use linguist src/i18n/ssqt5_zh_CN.ts to translating in the gui.
All these tools are from Qt5. in ubuntu, you can install theme by using: sudo apt-get install qttools5-dev-tools

@librehat 其实dynamic linking还能接受吧，用Enigma Virtual Box可以把dll都封装到一个exe里，不到30M大小和以前的静态编译没什么大的差别. 这是编译好的exe文件 https://pan.baidu.com/s/1otD8C6bgOBl_6TidI9RzhA. 需要安装 mingw-w64-x86_64-pkg-config. try compile libqtshadowsocks on your system.

redfrog999:
捣鼓了一下，自己解决了。原来是配置文件的问题，可以把导致程序不稳定的老的配置文件利用SS-QT5 2.5.0重新生成config.json，再次导入config.json程序生成config.ini就好了。希望能对遇到类似问题的提供参考。
. 呃，我在win8.1下2.5.0也是经常崩溃，后来观察到一个现象，就是如果你设定开机启动的服务器，然后需要切换到另外一个服务器，一开一关，崩溃了。如果不设定开机启动的服务器，断开几次没问题，但是运行一段时间会自动退出。期待下个版本能修复这个大问题。现在用回2.4.2版了。
. 鉴于网络现况和个人需求，我把QT5版的ss作为前置代理程序来使用，后端用的是rss最新版，二者配合使用，在2.5.0上就会不断重现崩溃场景：在大量传送数据之后，不论是否传输完毕，断开QT5中的现有链接，重新连上另外一个服务器，就会崩溃，而且连出错信息和log都留不下来，重启后直接回复原状。
作为对比测试，我不再把QT5作为前置代理来使用，直接用QT5做代理，结果看了半小时油管，断开，重连另外一个服务器没有再崩溃了。个人认为可能是QT5的2.5.0版在被其他SS客户端调用上有bug，而这个bug可能是更新的新功能带入的，在2.4.2上完全没有问题，不论是RSS中socks5调用，还是通过Proxifier来强制调用都是完全正常的。希望这样的反馈对开发者找到bug予以修复有帮助。
. @librehat 工作用网络封的太死，不用一个QT5作为前置，大部分的SS都用不了啊。QT5非常小巧可爱且低调，作为前置再适合不过了。2.5.0功能扩展方面也是当下所需，急盼你能修复这个大bug。THX
. @librehat RSS上跑的是我自己搭的vps支持混淆这些特性，QT5做前端跑的是一些免费SS站点提供的节点，不支持这些新特性，加上QT5图标界面之类的很清晰也便于区分嘛。所以就是这么个搭配方式。有希望解决这个问题吗？
. @librehat Socks5和HTTP都设置过，同样的场景重现。可惜win8.1下边抓不到log，都没法分析。有没有什么手段可以抓到错误信息呢？
. @librehat 好的，又有更新啦。感覺還是帶小尾巴的版本更堅固。
. 我的问题在2.5.1版解决了，同时开发者还解决了从多个节点删除其中一个或多个速度缓慢造成卡机的问题。THX。现在就等win64位的啦。
. @amazingfate 编译好了能不能共享下，我这里2.5.1版在win8.1下长时间使用还是会切换服务器就崩溃了。THX。

wangzhenya:
我也遇到一样的问题

因为ppa:hzwhuang/ss-qt5 并没有18.04版本的源，因此会出现
E: 仓库 “http://ppa.launchpad.net/hzwhuang/ss-qt5/ubuntu bionic Release” 没有 Release 文件 的错误。
这时，只要编辑/etc/apt/sources.list.d/hzwhuang-ubuntu-ss-qt5-bionic.list 文件，将bionic (18.04版本代号)改成xenial（16.04版本代号）
参考链接：https://www.codetd.com/article/3092913
.

slrslr:
Im not sure if i missed the readme, but to fix this issue i had to adjust line

"server":"127.0.0.1",

in file /etc/shadowsocks-libev/config.json on the server.
Once i changed it to real IP of the server and restarted shadowsocks-libev service on the server, connection was established
.
RacingDawn:
谢谢，问题已解决。因为我之前在安装时没有sudo dnf update更新缓存，只是执行了sudo dnf copr enable librehat/shadowsocks和sudo dnf install shadowsocks-qt5，导致安装好的shadowsocks-qt5一连接节点直接闪退。将其卸载后，重新用上述三条命令安装后连接成功。。。。。

. agree with @probonopd.
AppImage alpha3 still have libstdc++ dependency problem.
maybe a clean centos 6.9 is a proper platform to build AppImage. Sorry for the information that problem not solved completely, at least for rhel/centos7.
On ubuntu or debian, new compiler package include libstdc++.so. 
But things on rhel/centos are different. The only libstdc++ version is 4.8.5 on rhel/centos7. 
New compiler that support C++14 or C++17 is supported by package rh-devtoolset-6 or rh-devtoolset-7, which does not include libstdc++.so. So, for rhel/centos7, the CXXABI problem still exist.. Tried to compile sources with rh-devtoolset-6 and make the AppImage, the CXXABI problems solved.
So, for compatibility reason, would you please to compile the project on an older distribution? Thanks.

ykelvis:
ping没走你的socks端口，ping不到正常。
curl --proxy socks5://127.0.0.1:1080 ip.cn 这样看。. 你需要archlinuxcn的keyring。
pacman -S archlinuxcn-keyring
. try pacman -Syu and then reboot.
. 🌚然而aur和archcn都已经删了，不更新也并不会有任何帮助。. @JackWzh aur包进community的时候会直接被TU删掉. shadowsocks-qt5是ss的客户端，不兼容ssr， see #449 . https://github.com/shadowsocks/shadowsocks-qt5/issues/448#issuecomment-278270324. 这个客户端是SS的，不支持SSR的各种混淆协议。
See #449. #569 
chacha20-ietf-poly1305 is one of the several encrypt method brought by AEAD [0], you could also use keywords: aes-256-gcm/aead , or check those issues labeled with "duplicate".
448 is among the firsts on this subject. As of today, [1], the implementation has already been done on libshadowsocks, and there's a pre-release version for test. I think the release version won't be far away.
[0]: https://shadowsocks.org/en/spec/AEAD-Ciphers.html
[1]: https://github.com/shadowsocks/libQtShadowsocks/issues/126. Install SwithyOmega[1] and config proxy "socks5 127.0.0.1 1080".
1: https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/proxy-switchyomega/padekgcemlokbadohgkifijomclgjgif.

zkl99999:
ubuntu14.04.4
. 在网上搜到了解决办法，现在记录下来，以便今后查阅：
终端中输入以下两条命令：
sudo rm /var/lib/apt/lists/* -vf
sudo apt-get update
执行完了命令之后，软件更新器应该会自动要求更新的，更新便是。

. BTW after a quick searching I've found this, it seems some of the APIs may have some differences between Windows and OSX, especially some of the platform-related native APIs. I don't know much about Qt and OSX since I've just learned some .NET/C# in Windows before.
See: http://stackoverflow.com/questions/6521675/how-to-convert-qt-program-from-win-to-mac
        http://bbs.csdn.net/topics/390299577?page=1#post-393063755 （Chinese article）
. Also, is it possible that some of the APIs in your Shadowdocks-qt library (not this app) you've forgot to change?
Since Shadowsocks-OSX is obsoleted and it won't work on OSX 10.11, I'm now trying to remove some of the native API calls and SSL library API calls in Shadowsocks-Windows and see if I can port it to OSX via Mono runtime. But it's a bit difficult and I've heard from someone that the Mono runtime has some issues on AES encryption and it was extremely slow and not stable. So I think it is still a better choice to use ss-qt so far. 
. Okay, hope you can solve the problem soon.
. Okay got it... thanks.
. Good, it works right now. Great thanks for you guys!
.

自己笔记一下安装过程吧
*0. 我的环境
$ uname -a
Linux win10 4.4.0-31-generic #50-Ubuntu SMP Wed Jul 13 00:07:12 UTC 2016 x86_64 x86_64 x86_64 GNU/Linux
$ cat /etc/issue      
Ubuntu 16.04.1 LTS \n \l
$ uname -a
Linux win10 4.4.0-31-generic #50-Ubuntu SMP Wed Jul 13 00:07:12 UTC 2016 x86_64 x86_64 x86_64 GNU/Linux
$ qmake -v
QMake version 3.0
Using Qt version 5.7.1 in /opt/Qt5.7.1/5.7/gcc_64/lib

Qt5
下载 http://mirrors.ustc.edu.cn/qtproject/official_releases/qt/5.7/5.7.1/qt-opensource-linux-x64-5.7.1.run（这是 USTC 的镜像），chmod +x <这个 run 文件>，再运行 sudo ./<这个 run 文件>。

确定你的 qmake 正确配置了
qmake 会影响头文件的 include，uic/moc 的运行，etc。我之前总是安装失败就是
因为 qmake 的路径是 anaconda 里面那个。如果正确配置好了 qmake，应该是
这样的：
$ qmake -v
QMake version 3.0
Using Qt version 5.7.1 in /opt/Qt5.7.1/5.7/gcc_64/lib


安装依赖
可以直接参考 repo 里面的 .travis.yml 文件。
sudo add-apt-repository ppa:hzwhuang/ss-qt5 -y && sudo apt-get -qq update
sudo apt-get install qt5-qmake qt5-default qtbase5-dev libbotan1.10-dev gcc-4.8 libqrencode-dev libzbar-dev libappindicator-dev libqtshadowsocks-dev
sudo apt-get install libbotan1.10-dev
sudo apt-get install libzbar-dev libzbarqt-dev
sudo apt-get install libappindicator-dev


（可能有问题，这是我命令历史里面的记录。）
4. 编译
mkdir build
cd build
qmake ..
make
然后就有了 ss-qt5。

district10:
自己笔记一下安装过程吧
0. 我的环境
```
$ uname -a
Linux win10 4.4.0-31-generic #50-Ubuntu SMP Wed Jul 13 00:07:12 UTC 2016 x86_64 x86_64 x86_64 GNU/Linux
$ cat /etc/issue     
Ubuntu 16.04.1 LTS \n \l
$ uname -a
Linux win10 4.4.0-31-generic #50-Ubuntu SMP Wed Jul 13 00:07:12 UTC 2016 x86_64 x86_64 x86_64 GNU/Linux
$ qmake -v
QMake version 3.0
Using Qt version 5.7.1 in /opt/Qt5.7.1/5.7/gcc_64/lib
```
1. Qt5
下载 http://mirrors.ustc.edu.cn/qtproject/official_releases/qt/5.7/5.7.1/qt-opensource-linux-x64-5.7.1.run（这是 USTC 的镜像），chmod +x <这个 run 文件>，再运行 sudo ./<这个 run 文件>。
2. 确定你的 qmake 正确配置了
qmake 会影响头文件的 include，uic/moc 的运行，etc。我之前总是安装失败就是
因为 qmake 的路径是 anaconda 里面那个。如果正确配置好了 qmake，应该是
这样的：
$ qmake -v
QMake version 3.0
Using Qt version 5.7.1 in /opt/Qt5.7.1/5.7/gcc_64/lib
3. 安装依赖
可以直接参考 repo 里面的 .travis.yml 文件。
sudo add-apt-repository ppa:hzwhuang/ss-qt5 -y && sudo apt-get -qq update
sudo apt-get install qt5-qmake qt5-default qtbase5-dev libbotan1.10-dev gcc-4.8 libqrencode-dev libzbar-dev libappindicator-dev libqtshadowsocks-dev
sudo apt-get install libbotan1.10-dev
sudo apt-get install libzbar-dev libzbarqt-dev
sudo apt-get install libappindicator-dev
（可能有问题，这是我命令历史里面的记录。）
4. 编译
mkdir build
cd build
qmake ..
make
然后就有了 ss-qt5。.

wongsyrone:
I already convert system proxy setting code to WinINET stuff in shadowsocks-windows; someone says it will not work starting Windows RS2, like win10 14936, I'm not sure about it since I don't have such environment to test.
I checked the link above, it still uses INTERNET_PER_CONN_FLAGS, while MSDN says

Clients that support Internet Explorer 8 should query the connection type using INTERNET_PER_CONN_FLAGS_UI. If this query fails, then the system is running a previous version of Internet Explorer and the client should query again with INTERNET_PER_CONN_FLAGS.

Also, the InternetQueryOption usage looks superfluous; I removed this in C# code. This repo lacks refreshing code as well, you should restart IE manually to apply changes without it.
ref: https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/windows/desktop/aa385145(v=vs.85).aspx
. Indeed. I just find another issue; the previous code only applies for LAN, I modify it to support RAS.

meoow:
编译zbar并不非得需要Qt，我直接用--without-gtk --without-python --without-npapi --without-xshm --without-xv --disable-video --without-qt参数编译zbar，在mac下编译的ss-qt5可以正常读取图片和用capturer读取二维码。. Since your Qt5 libs are in /lib64/, I can tell your Qt5 is not from the CentOS 7 official repository, remove your version of Qt5, and install one through yum command.. Yeah I think it's more like an AppImage issue, 'cause any apps who can create autostart shortcuts by themselves are affected by this.
It's not really up to ss-qt5 developers to fix this..

iwarriorgit:
possible solution
floor 3 @ taohunter : 如能ping通服务器，那么检查一下你的客户端配置，最容易出问题的就是加密类型是否与服务器端匹配，另外还有密码字段（这个客户端密码字段有bug，最好用tab键移动到密码字段，输入或粘贴密码后再tab键到下一字段，密码才会确保被正确输入，否则可能会导致密码字段为”空“）
I just solved my problem today. All u need to do is:
1. floor 3, tab to past password
2. change system setting -> network -> network proxy ->
a. method -> automatic
b. Configuration -> your_pac_address eg:file:///home/username/gfwlist.pac
3. restart shadowsocks client
I am a linux beginner,  don't know the reason, maybe there is really a bug when u type in ur password by hand. 
Anyway, shadowsocks team is great, thanks.

jsonbruce:
Found Solution:
The libQtShadowsocks.so  renamed to libQtShadowsocks.so.1
1. Copy 
 sudo cp /usr/lib/libQtShadowsocks.so /usr/lib/libQtShadowsocks.so.1

Link
 sudo ln /usr/lib/libQtShadowsocks.so /usr/lib/libQtShadowsocks.so.1

Now, you can start SS from GUI or CLI normaly..

但这并不符合我的本意。请查看我提的问题. 我发现问题原因了，直接 git clone 下来的 “libQtShadowsocks” 版本是 1.11.0 但根据提示需要 >=2.0.0 。最新有 2.0.0 alpha版，但编译出来的 “libqtshadowsocks-dev” 却还是 1.11.0 版 。我试着用前一个版本 “shadowsocks-qt5 v2.8.0 版”，但编译时也报错了，前面太多省略，只复制最后报错提示部分如下：
.....
Makefile:657: recipe for target 'mainwindow.o' failed
make[1]:  [mainwindow.o] Error 1

I need your help, thank you !. 虽然问题已解决，但问题实际是出在 shadowsocks-qt5 开发人员，望开发人员早日修正该 Bug 。现在把我的解决办法贴出来。
在 git clone 下来的目录，即 libQtShadowsocks 目录，依次找到 debian --> control 文件，编辑两处内容（如下文本加粗部分），把原来的版本号 >=2.0.0 改为 1.0.0 即可。

begeekmyfriend:
This issue can be solved as follows
```shell
Install libsodium
sudo apt-get install libsodium-dev
Install libbotan-2.x from source
wget https://botan.randombit.net/releases/Botan-2.3.0.tgz
tar xvf Botan-2.3.0.tgz
cd Botan-2.3.0
./configure.py
make
sudo make install
sudo ldconfig
Install libQtShadowsocks
git clone https://github.com/shadowsocks/libQtShadowsocks.git
cd libQtShadowsocks
vim CMakeLists.txt
Change Line 8 as "On"
mkdir build
cd build
cmake ..
make
sudo make install
Install
git clone https://github.com/shadowsocks/shadowsocks-qt5
cd shadowsocks-qt5
mkdir build
cd build
cmake ..
make
sudo make install
```

jjit:
我也是这个错误，系统是刚刚发布的Linux Mint 18.3 “Sylvia” Cinnamon 64位的
原因应该是系统自带的libstdc++版本太旧了
去官网下载新版：http://ftp.de.debian.org/debian/pool/main/g/gcc-7/libstdc++6_7.2.0-16_amd64.deb
用命令解压 ar -x libstdc++6_7.2.0-16_amd64.deb && tar xvf data.tar.xz
把里面的2个文件 libstdc++.so.6 和libstdc++.so.6.0.24 复制到 /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/.
EdwardYuan:
更新gcc, g++到4.9:
sudo add-apt-repository ppa:ubuntu-toolchain-r/test
sudo apt-get update
sudo apt-get upgrade. https://github.com/shadowsocks/shadowsocks-qt5/releases.
ElunDai:
you should update your gcc and g++ to a higher version.
this work for me:
```
sudo add-apt-repository ppa:ubuntu-toolchain-r/test
sudo apt update
sudo apt install gcc-6
sudo apt install g++-6
sudo update-alternatives --install /usr/bin/gcc gcc /usr/bin/gcc-6 60 --slave /usr/bin/g++ g++ /usr/bin/g++-6    
```.

qsyttkx:
In ubuntu 18.04 LTS, shadowsocks-qt5 doesn't change the network proxy settings. Although you opened shadowsocks-qt5 and clicked connet, you can't surf through it.
Open settings(system, not ss-qt5) -> network -> network proxy, switch to manual. and modify the socks host as 127.0.0.1, port 1080. 
Then you can use it..

Dmupnsn:
After sever trials, finally get connected to Google now. Here are what I had done. Not sure whether all of them are necessary, but hope it can be useful to you guys:
1) Download Shadowsocks Appimage, change permission configuration be make it exectable; Input the information offered by your SS service supplier.
Just be careful here, the local port I used is 0 here. I tried with 1080 at first beginning(according to all the experiences shared online, they all used 1080), but it could not work. Finally I happened to notice that the default local port for my SS service is 0, so I changed all the local port to 0, in Appimage as well as in the configure files for shadowsocks and proxychains.
I guess for me that the most suspicious reason why it didn't work at the first beginning. You may need to pay attention to your local port, make it consistent with the service offered by your supplier? Not sure about that.
2) Also install the shadowsocks with sudo apt-get, and edit the configuration files with sudo gedit. 
3) Also install and edit the proxychains configure files (As mentioned above, use local port 0 here, instead of 1080);
4) Using Firefox, installed the Proxy SwitchyOmega Add on, and configure it as you can see when installing, or what you can find on internet. Nothing special.
5)After that, maybe you need to reboot the Firefox, or also your computer.
Then, open the Shadowsocks Appimage, connect with certain channel, ensure it shows connected, test Latency, if you want. if everything okay, you should be able to get access to Google now.. > After sever trials, finally get connected to Google now. Here are what I had done. Not sure whether all of them are necessary, but hope it can be useful to you guys:

1. Download Shadowsocks Appimage, change permission configuration be make it exectable; Input the information offered by your SS service supplier.
   Just be careful here, the local port I used is 0 here. I tried with 1080 at first beginning(according to all the experiences shared online, they all used 1080), but it could not work. Finally I happened to notice that the default local port for my SS service is 0, so I changed all the local port to 0, in Appimage as well as in the configure files for shadowsocks and proxychains.
   I guess for me that the most suspicious reason why it didn't work at the first beginning. You may need to pay attention to your local port, make it consistent with the service offered by your supplier? Not sure about that.

2. Also install the shadowsocks with sudo apt-get, and edit the configuration files with sudo gedit.

3. Also install and edit the proxychains configure files (As mentioned above, use local port 0 here, instead of 1080);

4. Using Firefox, installed the Proxy SwitchyOmega Add on, and configure it as you can see when installing, or what you can find on internet. Nothing special.

5)After that, maybe you need to reboot the Firefox, or also your computer.
Then, open the Shadowsocks Appimage, connect with certain channel, ensure it shows connected, test Latency, if you want. if everything okay, you should be able to get access to Google now.

Some update information: Just checked, even quit the AppImage, still be able to get access to the Google. Not necessary to edit the Network connection for the computer confirguration neither. So seems that the sudo install Shadowsocks/proxychains+Proxy switchyOmega for Firefox is enough, FYI. Just pay attention to the local port setting, still..

lina-not-linus:
造成的原因是 “libQtShadowsocks、botan2-devel” 未在相同的编译环境编译造成。 把 libQtShadowsocks、botan2-devel 在一个相同的环境内重新编译去修正为正确的依赖关系. @TaoistMo. > > 造成的原因是 “libQtShadowsocks、botan2-devel” 未在相同的编译环境编译造成。 把 libQtShadowsocks、botan2-devel 在一个相同的环境内重新编译去修正为正确的依赖关系

手动编译libQtShadowsocks的话，会安装到/usr/lib/libQtShadowsocks.so
而ss-qt5搜索目标是/usr/lib64/libQtShadowsocks.so
看了一下，/usr/lib/libQtShadowsocks.so指向的/usr/lib/libQtShadowsocks.so.2.1.0是64-bit elf文件。
那么修改这个路径的正确方式是什么？CMakeLists.txt文件里好像并没有指明这个路径


你这种编译结果和原作者毫无分别，未解决错误的依赖问题。正确的姿势是先编译 botan2-devel ，因为编译 libQtShadowsocks 时依赖 botan2-devel。 
libQtShadowsocks 源码内 CMakeLists.txt 前半部分写了很清楚的 库安装路径。
有很多的解决方式，找一个为安装 “libQtShadowsocks、botan2-devel ” 的环境，重新编译安装；或者使用之前编译、安装过 “libQtShadowsocks、botan2-devel” 的移除掉他们；或者不移除 “libQtShadowsocks、botan2-devel” 重新编译安装 botan2-devel 制定 lib 安装路径，然后在编译 libQtShadowsocks 前指定动态库搜索路径，并放到搜索路径最前面(刚刚制定 lib 安装的路径)..

我没有自行编译botan2-devel
进行了如下操作：
1. 卸载通过dnf安装的libQtShadowsocks
2. libQtShadowsocks/CMakeLists.txt第10行修改为：set(LIB_INSTALL_DIR ${CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX}/lib64
3. libQtShadowsocks/CMakeLists.txt第30行修改为：pkg_search_module(BOTAN REQUIRED botan-2>=2.3.0)
4. libQtShadowsocks/conanfile.txt第2行修改为：botan/2.8.0@bincrafters/stable
5. 清空build目录并重新编译安装libQtShadowsocks和ss-qt5
这样之后正常的
有些操作可能没有必要，或者有更好的方法。.

Liuqing650:
thx，我也是安装的Ubuntu18，按照上面的方法解决了ss测试延时或者错误的问题，已经可以顺利ss了
以下是我的步骤
1. Ubuntu 18的网络设置中禁用 ipv6
2. 安装 shadowsocks-qt5,
 sudo add-apt-repository ppa:hzwhuang/ss-qt5
 Ubuntu 18安装会失败: 仓库 “http://ppa.launchpad.net/hzwhuang/ss-qt5/ubuntu bionic Release” 没有 Release 文件 的错误
 解决办法： 
 a. 编辑/etc/apt/sources.list.d/hzwhuang-ubuntu-ss-qt5-bionic.list 文件，将bionic (18.04版本代号)改成xenial（16.04版本代号）
b. 再执行 sudo apt-get update
c. 安装ss-qt5 sudo apt-get install shadowsocks-qt5
3. 安装完成后配置网络代理
    a. 选择手动
    b. http代理端口设置为 8080，其它不要管
    c. Socks 主机设置为 127.0.0.1，端口设置为1080
4. 配置 ss
    比较好的方式是先打开 shadowsocks-qt5，选择： 连接-添加-手动中配置好你的账号
    再选择： 文件-导出为gui-config.json文件
    回到Ubuntu文件夹下，编辑这个文件 ~/gui-config.json
编辑格式：
jsx
{
"server":"95.169.22.45",
"server_port":10586,
"local_address":"127.0.0.1",
"local_port":1080,
"password":"********",
"timeout":300,
"method":"chacha20-ietf-poly1305",
"fast_open":false
}
编辑完成以后，再次导入到 shadowsocks-qt5 中。

配置防火墙 sudo ufw allow from 95.169.22.45
配置到这里就可以正常的在Ubuntu18 中打开使用 ss 了。
.

EGQM:
参见：https://github.com/shadowsocks/shadowsocks-qt5/issues/785. 这个问题，应该不是由shadowsocks-qt5造成。我觉得是：shadowsocks-qt5依赖libQtShadowsocks，而libQtShadowsocks依赖botan2；fedora29升级了botan2后，原来的接口已被改变，shadowsocks-qt5调用libQtShadowsocks时，libQtShadowsocks运行异常。我处理的方法是：
sudo yum update #使得botan2升级到最高的版本
sudo yum install botan2-devel
然后卸载系统上使用包管理器安装的libQtShadowsocks-devel
sudo dnf remove libQtShadowsocks-devel libQtShadowsocks
最后，编译安装libQtShadowsocks
git clone https://github.com/shadowsocks/libQtShadowsocks
cd libQtShadowsocks
mkdir build && cd build
cmake .. -DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX=/usr
make -j4
sudo make install
完活。我按上面的操作后，验证可行。.
